subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ron Polk, the Southeastern Conference’s career leader in coaching wins and an outspoken critic of the N.C.A.A. during his tenure at Mississippi State, has resigned. The university said his resignation would take effect at the end of the season. Polk is in his 29th season as head coach at Mississippi State and in his 35th over all. He has clashed with the N.C.A.A. over recent rules changes.
snippet: Ron Polk, the Southeastern Conference’s career leader in coaching wins and an outspoken critic of the N.C.A.A. during his tenure at Mississippi State, has resigned. The university said his resignation would take effect at the end of the season....
